title: CHAN Cheuk Kin | Game, Animation
chameleon_description: A survival horror game where you collect items in a forest, while being hunted down by a shape-shifting monster.
procedural_generation_description: All geometries and placements of environmental assets were randomly procedurally generated. (Note: Textures were downloaded online)
model_assets_description: Other assets were modelled and animated in Blender by myself.
monster_lore_a: A <u>shape-shifting</u> monster lives in the depths of the woods...
monster_lore_b: Morphing into a rock to avoid being spotted...
pivot_description: An innovative casual 2D game where you fight off monsters by only manipulating the rotational pivot to move around.
